data.text: Heshima iyogweleligwa mbozi haifaya,
Kamba viili kwa shomolo hebu kinega viwoguluka,
Mbalati kwa falasi, lijamu kwa kihongwe,
Sambi umwidike mbozi kwa ubozi,
Mwidike mbozi kuigala na ubozi wake,
Yogala usenga kubitila mbozi,
Kamba magulu ga mbetembete vigotinga,
Kumgwaa heshima mbozi,
Kamba munhu yakoligwe yogeza kung'ola mwiba mumkono wake,
Munhu yomuajili mbozi hebu munhu yobita nzila,
Mbozi yobwelela ubozi wake,
Wahamona munhu koiyona mbala,
Munhu mnyeke kolonga, â€œAko kunze kuna simba,
Kamba vija mulango vuutinga kunze na mgati,
Munhu mnyeke kougela mkono wake mwiisahani ya ndiya,
Mnyeke koiyona mbala,
Yoingiza muugomvi siwake,
Kamba munhu yeli na lukwale viyochezela miwenge ya moto,
vivo viili kwa munhu yomvizila miyage,
Kamba habule ngodi moto ofa,
Kamba vigeli makala hebu ngodi vizikong'heza moto,
Mbuli za kidelenya kamba ndiya inogile,
Kamba shaba ibakigwe mwiinongo,
Munhu yokwihila kofisa kwiha kwake kwa mbuli zinogile,
Yahalonga mbuli zinogile sambi umtogole,
Kodaha kufisa kukwihila kwake,
Yohimba simo kokwingila mwenyego,
Munhu yolonga uvizi kowehila waja yowalumiza,
